Chapter 6 Interactive component <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title></title> <script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v6.js"></script> <style type ="text/css"> </style> </head> <body> <svg width="1000" height="300" id="svg1"></svg> <svg width="1000" height="300" id="svg2"></svg> <script> var svg1 = d3.select("#svg1") var margin = {top: 20, right: 50, bottom: 30, left: 50} var width = svg1.attr("width") - margin.left - margin.right var height = svg1.attr("height") - margin.top - margin.bottom var g1 = svg1.append("g").attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left}, ${margin.top})`); d3.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ds-eda-viz/NYC-Bike-Share/main/rendered_data/weekend_weekday_dist.csv", readfile) .then(function(data){ var weekday = data.filter(function(d) {return d.is_weekend == "weekday";}); var bars = g1.selectAll(".bar").data(weekday).enter().append("rect").attr("class", "bar") bars.attr("x", function(d) {return xScale(d.hour);}) .attr("y", function(d) {return yScale(d.trips);}) .attr("width", xScale.bandwidth()*0.95) .attr("height", function(d) {return height - yScale(d.trips)}) .attr("fill", "steelblue") .on("mouseover", function(){ d3.select(this).attr("fill", "orange");}) .on("mouseout", function(){ d3.select(this).attr("fill", "steelblue");}); var xScale = d3.scaleBand().domain(d3.range(24)).range([0, width]); var yScale = d3.scaleLinear().domain([0, 4000]).range([height, 0]); var xAxis = d3.axisBottom(xScale); var yAxis = d3.axisLeft(yScale); g2.append("text") .attr("x", "10") .attr("y", "20") .text("Number of Trips during Weekends"); g2.append("text") .attr("x", "10") .attr("y", "40") .text("(in thousands)"); }); </script> </body>
